alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henderson County through 445 PM CDT... At 420 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Robards, or near Henderson, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Henderson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 138 and 148. Audubon Parkway between Mile Markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
